text: Football Club West Armenia (), is an Armenian football club based in the capital Yerevan. ==History== On 13 June 2019, FC West Armenia was officially founded in Yerevan by Gevorg Martirosyan. In its first year of foundation, West Armenia applied to take part in the Armenian First League. Former Armenian international Armen Shahgeldyan is the current manager of the team.Արմեն Շահգելդյանը կգլխավորի նորաստեղծ Վեստ Արմենիա ֆուտբոլային ակումբը Mika Stadium is the home ground of West Armenia. ==Current squad== ==Managerial history== * Armen Shahgeldyan (13 June 2019 – ) ==References== Category:Football clubs in Armenia Category:Football clubs in Yerevan Category:Association football clubs established in 2019 Category:2019 establishments in Armenia
title: FC West Armenia
